# FieldPad: HVAC Service Pro

> Offline-first iOS app for HVAC and refrigeration technicians to track EPA compliance, calculate leak rates, manage refrigerant inventory, and generate professional invoices.

## About FieldPad

FieldPad is a mobile application (iOS 17+) designed for solo HVAC technicians and small refrigeration service companies. It provides offline-first EPA Section 608 and AIM Act Subpart C compliance tracking, leak rate calculations, A2L refrigerant safety checklists, refrigerant cylinder inventory management with OCR scanning, and professional invoicing with digital signatures.

**Developer**: Huggler Holdings LLC
**Contact**: fieldpad@hugglerholdings.com
**Website**: https://fieldpadpro.com
**App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/app/fieldpad-hvac-service-pro/id6745066925

## Key Features

- **EPA Section 608 Compliance**: Track ODS refrigerant service events for systems with 50+ lbs of charge. Leak rate thresholds: Commercial 20%, Comfort Cooling 15%, Industrial 30%.
- **AIM Act Subpart C Compliance**: Track HFC refrigerant service events (GWP > 53) for systems with 15+ lbs of charge (effective January 1, 2026). Leak rate thresholds: Commercial 20%, Comfort Cooling 10%, Industrial 30%, Transport 10%.
- **Leak Rate Calculations**: Automatic Method 1 (Annualized) and Method 2 (Screening) calculations with threshold comparison.
- **A2L Safety Checklists**: 6 mandatory safety checks for flammable refrigerants (R-454B, R-32, R-452B): dissipation risk, spark-free tools, ventilation, PPE, A2L leak detector, grounding.
- **5,000 Rule Calculator**: Repair vs replace recommendations based on refrigerant cost and equipment charge.
- **OCR Cylinder Scanning**: On-device Vision OCR to read refrigerant cylinder labels.
- **Professional Invoicing**: PDF invoices with digital signatures, split tax rates, and refrigerant line items.
- **Offline-First**: All features work without internet connectivity. Data syncs via iCloud when online.
- **Glove Mode**: 48pt minimum touch targets for field use with protective gloves.
- **Chronic Leaker Detection**: Monitors cumulative refrigerant additions against 125% annual threshold with March 1 reporting deadline tracking.

## Regulatory Frameworks

### Section 608 (ODS Refrigerants)
- Applies to: Systems with 50+ lbs of ODS refrigerant (e.g., R-22)
- Leak thresholds: Commercial 20%, Comfort Cooling 15%, Industrial 30%
- Repair deadline: 30 days (120 days for industrial process)
- Record retention: Minimum 3 years

### Subpart C (HFC Refrigerants, effective Jan 1, 2026)
- Applies to: Systems with 15+ lbs of HFC refrigerant with GWP > 53 (e.g., R-410A, R-454B, R-32)
- Leak thresholds: Commercial 20%, Comfort Cooling 10%, Industrial 30%, Transport 10%
- Repair deadline: 30 days for all types
- Follow-up verification: 10 days (vs 30 days under Section 608)
- Record retention: Minimum 3 years

## Privacy

- All data stored locally on device (SwiftData/SQLite) and in user's private iCloud container
- No server-side storage — Huggler Holdings LLC does not operate any servers
- No analytics, tracking, or advertising
- Only third-party services: RevenueCat (anonymous subscription management), Apple MapKit (address autocomplete), Apple iCloud (data sync)
